channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Live tennis from Wimbledon, the third of this year's four grand slams. The action continues, with players battling for a place in the second week of the Championships. At this stage in 2025, seven-time winner Novak Djokovic beat Australian Alexei Popyrin in straight sets, while Britain's Cameron Norrie bowed out to German fourth seed Alexander Zverev.
